author: Charles White
title: Doris Day is trending in the UK as Storm Doris blows on â€“ #DorisDay | Metro News
text:
A lot of people are blaming Doris Day for the bad weather Charles White Thursday 23 Feb 2017 1:34 pm Doris Day is whipping up a storm on social media (Picture: Everett/REX Shutterstock) 
The American star, Doris Day, is whipping up a storm on Twitter as users react to Storm Doris in the UK. 
Cold weather and harsh winds left many drawing comparisons with the starâ€™s hit song The Windy City. Teenager died after branch snapped and he hit head on submerged rock 
In her iconic film Calamity Jane the 92-year-old actress sang: â€˜I just blew in from the Windy City. The Windy City is mighty pretty. But they ainâ€™t got what we got, no sir.â€™ 
For some reason, a lot of people in the UK appear to be a little confused, thinking Doris Day might be linked to the latest bout of bad weather. 
The woman dressed as a cowgirl wants you to stay safe ğŸ¶ I just blew in from the Windy City,The Windy City is mighty pretty.. ğŸ¶
